comments:
I20030701

NPE in Customize Perspective action if category has no view assigned.

Test Case is to add:

<extension point="org.eclipse.ui.views">
  <category 
    id="org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.viewcategory"
    name="Test Views">
  </category>
</extension>
